title: Riven needs buffs
body: Coming from a plat and a Riven main myself I have been struggling with her for a long time since the days when last whisper got reworked. I have tried every possible build on her and watch all the youtubers who play her but i feel she is struggling to vs alot of top laners. What does everyone think? Am I crazy or is this a valid point that needs to be addressed? I hope riot sees this so we can have a friendly discussion! Thanks :)

replies.body:
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Xu%C3%ADzun%C3%A4

Where is riven on your top play list? You dont play the champ at all, so ofcourse you dont know wtf you are doing.

She is top on my mastery hence the most used champ of mine. Please don’t be nasty and if you did more of a search on my account rather just look at my games you would have noticed that i play her alot :)

Ok, but where do you play her? Customs? It's not trying to be nasty mate, it's actual curiosity. I can see that you did not play her at all in ranked S8, 3 games in S7(1 win, 2 loss), 2 games in S6(1 win, 1 loss) and 9 games in S5(9 wins). In normals, it's still only 16 games. Mastery doesn't mean much. Are you playing her on a smurf? That would make some sense.

I thought that Riven needs buff too, some time during Season 8, when Darius got buffed, but I knew that at least for me, she may not necessarily need buffs right now, not with the new rune system.
Just take Electrocute, or Lethal Tempo. If you take Conqueror it would be too hard to proc since Riven is not autoattack based, even after you used your third Q, it takes a bit more time to proc that keystone, take it at your own risk. Electrocute works better because it is both autoattack and ability based keystone. With Adaptive Force you shouldn't be weak at all, though sometimes your opponent may be stronger than you.
Thanks for that wean! I will give that a shot and see how I go! Without conqueror i would be useless fighting tanks right? How would you counter that with electrocute?

Take Cheap Shot along with electrocute, Cheap Shot deals true damage as well.
You may also want to take Cut Down, so you deal more damage when your enemy have more max health than you.

No offense but you're both cooked, riven is fine right now and conqueror is probably the best tune choice.

Watch twitch.tv/1adrianaries1 and this guy will show you why

as sombody who has many accounts banned becuase of riven matchups and how much of a dog shit champion she is. (and an ex top main) she needs nerfs so bad but we wont ever get em cause she doesnt affect pro play
But the thing with Riven is if you can put in the time to master her, you can dominated most match ups
I can dominate early game with no problems, but i just feel the damage is lacking late compared to other top laners
